mapper.select: SELECT `user`.province AS `name`, Count(`user`.province) AS `value` from `user` GROUP BY `user`.province

select ifnull(b.count,0)as count from ( SELECT curdate() as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 4 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 6 day) as click_date ) a left join ( select createDate, count(*)as count from `user` group by createDate ) b on a.click_date = b.createDate;
